name: Zava LifePoints Starter
description: Start your rewards journey with our entry-level LifePoints program. Earn 1 point per dollar spent at partner merchants and redeem for gift cards, merchandise, or experiences.

name: Zava Premium Rewards
description: Unlock premium benefits with accelerated earning rates. Get 2x points on dining, 3x points on travel, and exclusive access to VIP experiences and events.

name: Zava B2B Loyalty Program
description: Corporate rewards program designed for business purchases. Earn points on office supplies, business services, and employee benefits. Perfect for small to medium businesses.

name: Zava Cashback Elite
description: Premium cashback program offering up to 5% cashback on rotating categories and 2% on all other purchases. No spending caps or restrictions.

name: Zava Enterprise Rewards
description: Large enterprise rewards solution with customizable earning rates, bulk redemption options, and dedicated account management for organizations.

name: Zava Travel Rewards
description: Specialized rewards program for frequent travelers. Earn bonus points on flights, hotels, and car rentals. Includes travel insurance and concierge services.

name: Zava Student Rewards
description: Special rewards program for students with bonus points on educational purchases, textbooks, and dining. Lower spending requirements and flexible redemption options.

name: Zava Family Rewards
description: Multi-member family rewards program allowing points sharing and family-based earning bonuses. Special rates on family entertainment and dining.

name: Zava Startup Accelerator
description: Rewards program tailored for startups and new businesses. Earn points on business tools, software subscriptions, and professional services with startup-friendly terms.

name: Zava Platinum Elite
description: Our highest tier rewards program with unlimited earning potential, priority customer service, exclusive events, and personalized rewards concierge.

name: Zava LifePoints Starter
text: With Zava LifePoints Starter, begin your rewards journey with no membership fees or complicated requirements. Simply start earning points on every purchase at our partner merchants. Whether you're buying groceries, dining out, or shopping online, every dollar spent gets you closer to amazing rewards and experiences.

name: Zava LifePoints Starter
text: Zava LifePoints Starter makes earning rewards simple and straightforward. With no complex rules or restrictions, you can start accumulating points immediately on your everyday purchases. Whether you prefer to redeem for instant discounts, save up for bigger rewards, or treat yourself to exclusive experiences, the choice is always yours.

name: Zava Premium Rewards
text: Zava Premium Rewards takes your earning potential to the next level with accelerated point multipliers. Enjoy 2x points when dining at restaurants and 3x points on all travel purchases. Plus, gain exclusive access to VIP experiences and member-only events that money can't buy.

name: Zava B2B Loyalty Program
text: Designed specifically for business needs, Zava B2B Loyalty Program rewards your company purchases with valuable points. From office supplies to business services, every dollar your company spends contributes to rewards that can benefit your entire team and operations.

name: Zava Cashback Elite
text: With Zava Cashback Elite, enjoy the flexibility of earning up to 5% cashback on rotating bonus categories and a solid 2% on all other purchases. No annual spending caps, no restrictions, just pure earning power that puts money back in your pocket with every transaction.
